pdescription: The first novel in the worldwide bestselling series by Suzanne Collins! Winning means fame and fortune. Losing means certain death.
An action-packed comedy about a fake family that includes a spy, an assassin and a telepath!
The novels chronicle the lives of a young wizard, Harry Potter, and his friends Hermione Granger and Ron Weasley,

pname: A Song of Ice and Fire
pdescription: HBO’s hit series A Game of Thrones is based on George R R Martin’s internationally bestselling series A Song of Ice and Fire, the greatest fantasy epic of the modern age.
The Super Cup Face-Off is the 81st book in the Geronimo Stilton series and was released on 28th June, 2022
A beautiful story of friendship between a polar bear and a lonely girl, staying in the Arctic with her scientist father.
